projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Weather Prediction App
projects.bodyText:
- The project uses HTML and CSS to create a responsive and user-friendly design.
 - It integrates APIs to fetch and display dynamic data from external sources.
 - React JS powers the frontend, while Django handles the backend, ensuring a robust full-stack solution.

projects.title: CRUD App
projects.bodyText:
- CRUD Application built with React
 - Create, Read, Update, and Delete data in a seamless and interactive way.
